duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform as a team member and provide expertise in SAP FI, Controlling (CO), and COPA.
Engage in business analysis and provide insights to support financial decision-making.
Collaborate with the team to enhance SAP FI and Controlling (CO) processes and systems.
Assist in the implementation and maintenance of COPA systems and processes.
Provide support for financial reporting and analysis requirements using SAP FI and COPA.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
